org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

Interface HadoopMapReduceInfoService


  • public interface HadoopMapReduceInfoService

    A service provided in addition to HadoopConnectingMapReduceService. Together they form a complete map/reduce API that is not Hadoop API and Hadoop version specific.

    This service provides access to general map/reduce information that do not require connection to Hadoop cluster to be obtained, yet can differ along various versions of Hadoop API. Therefore this service does not extend HadoopConnectingService and is suitable for use in designer because its operations may not fail due to external factors.

    Since:
    rel-3-4-0-M2
    See Also:
    HadoopConnectingMapReduceService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<HadoopCounterGroup> getCounterGroups()
      Gets predefined counter groups that are available for all map/reduce jobs.

    • Method Detail

      • getCounterGroups

        java.util.List<HadoopCounterGroup> getCounterGroups()
        Gets predefined counter groups that are available for all map/reduce jobs. These groups contain all default counters that have their values computed automatically by Hadoop for all map/reduce job. Does not include any custom, user defined counters.
        Returns:
        List of all default, predefined counter groups which are available for all map/reduce jobs,
        See Also:
        HadoopCounterKey, HadoopJobReporter.getCounterValue(HadoopCounterKey), HadoopJobReporter#getCustomCounters()
